actions.text: Amendment SA 4169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 4169 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Coats. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3489) To require a report on the discharge by warrant officers of pilot and other flight officer positions in the Navy, Marine Corps, and Air Force currently discharged by commissioned officers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4169 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Coats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To require a report on the discharge by warrant officers of pilot and other flight officer positions in the Navy, Marine Corps, and Air Force currently discharged by commissioned officers.
